subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The N.H.L. picked Peter Laviolette of the Nashville Predators and Darryl Sutter of the Los Angeles Kings as the head coaches for the All-Star Game in Columbus on Jan. 25.
snippet: The N.H.L. picked Peter Laviolette of the Nashville Predators and Darryl Sutter of the Los Angeles Kings as the head coaches for the All-Star Game in Columbus on Jan. 25.
